import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./header.css"; const Header = () => { window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const scrollUp = document.querySelector(".scrollup"); if (this.scrollY >= 560) scrollUp.classList.add ("show-scroll"); else scrollUp.classList.remove("show-scroll"); }); /*========================= Toggle Menu ========================*/ const[Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); return(
